description:
Tamako asks Rinne to train a young black cat to support a Shinigami, but this cat`s particular phobia gets in the way. Later, Rinne hopes to intercept a "lucky" pot of money!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuroboshi Sansei / Kaiun no Tsubo / Niji-iro no Takenoko
Kuroboshi Sansei / The Lucky Pot / Bamboo Shoot in Rainbow Color
Sanse Kuroboshi – Le pot de chance – La pousse de bambou arc-en-ciel
黒星三世 / 開運の壺 / 虹色のタケノコ
